title: How much does assistive technology cost? - Quora

author_info.name: Institute of Performing Art Mind Power Development

response.answer_text: The cost of Braille EDGE 40 Display is $2,995. The cost of Kenguru Electric Car is US$25,000. The cost of HeadMouse Extreme is US$995. The cost of Alarm Clock Pro Vibrating Clock is US$99 +.
